name: WhatAShout-weeklyhorseracingshow
0:
”Alexa, play What A Shout”
”Alexa, ask What A Shout to play the latest episode”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what a shout
Developer Terms of Use
des:
What A Shout is a weekly horse racing show hosted by experts from Racing Post featuring guests from the world of horse racing.

Join us every week for all the big calls and big races every Friday - this Skill lets you view or listen to the most recent episode.

Just say "Alexa, play What A Shout".

For Alexa devices with screens and Alexa on Fire TV, you will be able to view the full video. For audio-only Alexa devices, you will get the audio.

++ Responsible gambling ++
This skill is for persons aged 18+. Please gamble responsibly.

Help with problem gambling is available from the following organisations:
Gamble Aware: https://begambleaware.org
GamCare: https://www.gamcare.org.uk
Gamblers Anonymous: https://gamblersanonymous.org.uk
